title: Define Quantum Communication Technology for Drones: Research Proposal
description: Conduct comprehensive research on the appropriate quantum communication technology for the drones to ensure secure data transmission. Identify potential challenges, propose solutions, and provide a detailed analysis. This task serves as a foundation for further development.

title: Design Quantum Communication System Architecture
description: Create a system architecture design for the quantum communication system to be used in the drones.
dependencies: Define Quantum Communication Technology for Drones

title: Develop Frontend Interface for Drones
description: Design and develop the frontend interface for controlling and monitoring the drones.

title: Develop Backend Services for Drones
description: Create the backend services required to manage and control the drones, including integration with the quantum communication system.

title: Integrate Quantum Communication into Drones
description: Implement the quantum communication system design into the drones hardware and software.

title: Test and Validate Quantum Communication System
description: Perform testing and validation of the quantum communication system to ensure it meets security and performance requirements.
